title: The Circle recap: Jack & Beth team up to catfish as 62-year-old Joyce
text:
Beth and Jack react to having to catfish as ‘Joyce’ (Picture: Channel 4)

The Circle shook things up by automatically blocking the two lowest ranking contestants, Jack and Beth.

But what the other contestants don’t know is: They’re now teaming up and playing together to catfish as 62-year-old Joyce.

So what do you need to know from the latest episode? Here’s the lowdown on what happened.

Paddy Picks in power move

The episode started off with pizza and a party, while the contestants danced alone to Britney Spears.

Cut to the music ending and Tim adorably asking: ‘Was that Beyonce or something?’

Tim and Paddy dance to Britney Spears (Picture: Channel 4)

The party then heated up with a friendly game to get to know newbie Paddy.

It worked like this: Each contestant had to enter a photo of their own (that no one else in the game had seen before) into different categories like ‘Sexy’, ‘Funny’ and ‘No Filter’.

Advertisement

Advertisement

After each player submitted their photo to The Circle group chat, Paddy had the power to grant one of them as the winner of that category.

The lovable Irish lad chose Ella riding two dolphins as the winner in the ‘Funny’ category, while Jack won the ‘Sexy’ category with a photo of himself shirtless in a towel.

But it was the ‘No Filter’ category that pulled at everyone’s heart strings and really moved Paddy.

(Picture: Channel 4)

Georgina, who has Crohn’s disease – uploaded a photo of herself with a breathing tube. As soon as Paddy saw it, he remarked to himself: ‘It takes courage to put a picture like that up.’

There was no doubt in Paddy’s mind that Georgina was the winner.

Their prize? The winning contestants got to keep their winning photos in their profile.

Dating disaster stories

In true Ella style, she wanted to cut through the boring small talk between the contestants and spice things up by asking Beth and Brooke if they had any dating horror stories.

Brooke goes first and regales the group chat with a story about a guy who lied about his age, job and living situation

She then jokes: ‘You could say I was slightly catfished but it wouldn’t be the first time #JaysMum’

Beth goes next and underwhelms the group with another catfish story.

Ella (Picture: Channel 4)

Then Ella takes the cake with the ultimate dating horror story.

‘I once used a guy’s thumb print whilst he slept to get into his phone and book a taxi because my phone had died,’ Ella revealed. ‘I then didn’t speak to him again #HumpAndDump’

Advertisement

Advertisement

Omg Ella.

Paddy and Georgina make the nation cry

Next came the sweetest conversation between Paddy and Georgina about living with their disabilities.

Paddy took the opportunity to tell Georgina he thought her posting the photo in the hospital bed was ‘brave’.

He then decided to open up to her about his own disability – a fact he had deliberately held back from telling the other contestants.

Paddy tells Georgina: ‘I think we could have a lot in common in terms of obstacles we’ve had to overcome. That picture you posted last night of you in the hospital was brave.’

He continues: ‘I know how hard it is to talk about your condition when people ask. I know this because I have cerebral palsy in my legs. I haven’t told people yet but felt I could trust you with this.’

Paddy and Georgina get emotional (Picture: Channel 4)

Georgina is taken aback by the revelation and they both start crying.

She messages back: ‘May I ask why you feel you want to hide it from the group? It can remain our secret, but I don’t want you to feel like it’s something that you have to keep quiet.’

Paddy responds: ‘It’s not that I’m ashamed or scared. It’s that I wanted to feel what it would be like for once to just be me and not be “that disabled guy”‘.

Beth and Jack team up to become Joyce

At the end of the episode, it’s revealed Beth and Jack scored the lowest ratings in the latest ranking of the contestants so in a twist, they’re both immediately blocked from The Circle.

Advertisement

The pair pack their bags and head to the Inner Circle to meet each other for the first time.

Jack discovers that Beth has been using someone else’s photos but remarks he fancies her.

The Circle then reveal the public voted to keep both Beth and Jack in the game.

(Picture: Channel 4)

The pair then make their way to their new shared apartment and get to know their surroundings (no, they’re not sharing a bed).

Then it’s time to find out who they’re going to be going back into the game as, as they nervously wait to see who pops up.

Cut to 62-year-old Joyce popping up on screen, holding her adorable puppy.

The two react in horror as they start to piece together exactly how they’re going to pull it all off.

Good luck, guys.

The Circle continues Monday at 10pm on Channel 4.

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

MORE: Miley Cyrus broke it off with Kaitlynn Carter because it was moving too fast
description: Blocked contestants Jack and Beth have now teamed up and will go back into the game to catfish as 62-year-old Joyce.
